sentence.text: Jusst awesome I hv to thank whatsapp fr almost a thousand reasons. Its been fun n Vry responsible to many users. I am on9 almst evry time with itn love it soo much. Only. If it would hv voice cll.. tht would be gr8

deleted all data , still it says 70 MB !! i m using 4.1 jelly bean , i went in the settings of whatsapp and press CLEAR ALL CONVERSATIONS and whatsapp cleared all conversations , i also deleted manually all the files / folders of whatsapp images n videos but still it is saying 70 MB data !!!! (in manage applications of android) please let me know where are more files stored of whatsapp in my phone ? plz note i dont want to press CLEAR DATA bcz i need to setup my account again then . please Let me know that when i clear all the conversations / and also deleted 2 main folders of whatsapp images and whatsapp videos then WHY it is still showing the data size of whatsapp is over 70 MB !!!! please reply .
